    • Field Detail

      • RESERVED_FLAGS

        protected static final int RESERVED_FLAGS
        Bits in _flags reserved by this class.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • _flags

        protected int _flags
        Temporary flags that can be used to mark the node during the execution of various algorithms or to mark non-static attributes of the node.

        The flags are automatically cleared by ISolverNode.initialize().

        Subclasses should document which flags are reserved for use by that class and which ones are available for use by subclasses.

        Flags should generally be get/set using method provided by this class.

        Since:
        0.06
        See Also:
        clearFlags(), clearFlags(int), isFlagSet(int), setFlags(int)

      • getEventParent

        @Nullable
public ISolverFactorGraph getEventParent()
        Description copied from interface: IDimpleEventSource
        The parent of this object in the event hierarchy or null if at root.

        Unless otherwise noted, this will always have the same value as IOptionHolder.getOptionParent().

        Specified by:
        getEventParent in interface IDimpleEventSource

      • getEventSourceName

        public java.lang.String getEventSourceName()
        Name of source for use in DimpleEvent.

        Default implementation provided by this class returns the event source name of getModelEventSource() if non-null, otherwise the result of the Object.toString() method.

        This behavior is likely to change in the future.

        Specified by:
        getEventSourceName in interface IDimpleEventSource

      • getModelEventSource

        @Nullable
public IModelEventSource getModelEventSource()
        Description copied from interface: IDimpleEventSource
        The model object that is most closely associated with the source.

        If this object is itself a IModelEventSource this method should simply return this object.

        Specified by:

      • notifyListenerChanged

        public void notifyListenerChanged()
        Description copied from interface: IDimpleEventSource
        Notify the source that it should refresh its event setting.

        This can be used when the event listener settings affecting this object have changed dynamically and you want the changes to take effect earlier than would be the case automatically. For instance, objects that can generate high-frequency events may normally refresh their settings during the initialization phase.

        Specified by:
        notifyListenerChanged in interface IDimpleEventSource

      • clearFlags

        protected final void clearFlags()
        Clear all flag values. Invoked automatically by ISolverNode.initialize().

      • clearFlags

        protected final void clearFlags(int mask)
        Clear flags in given mask.

      • getEventMask

        protected int getEventMask()
        Return mask of flag bits that are used to determine whether to generate events. This is used by notifyListenerChanged() to clear the specified flag bits. It is assumed that the value of all zeros indicates that the object needs to recompute its flags based on the listener.

        The default implementation returns zero.

        Overriders should usually combine local value with value from super class using bitwise or, e.g.: 

            return ThisClass.EVENT_MASK | super.getEventMask();
        Since:
        0.06

      • getFlagValue

        @Internal
public final int getFlagValue(int mask)
